channel.title: Need some advance help ~connecting worlds~ read pelase
channel.description:
I have two worlds each world is connected to the other meaning if you make a player on 'world1' you can use that same player on 'world2' but i have a problem...
I cant figure out...
say you want to say hi to a friend on world one and your on world 2 but the problem is it shows the other people offline when your on another world... can someone help please? tyvm!
I have the two worlds connected as in if u make a player and get 99 crafting one world 1 that same player can be used on world 2
if i can find the method of when buddy list logs in and out i can change it myself jsut like it i did for the characters
if anyone can point me in that direction even..

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I don’t think anyone has done this yet.
